excavator_info.name: Excavator
excavator_info.content: The hydraulics of this excavator have been sabotaged. It seems that it was not long ago due to the oil that is still dripping.

car_info.name: Parked Car
car_info.content: It seems to be an old model. The rear tire is flat and the engine seems to be leaking coolant.

letter.name: Letter
letter.content: I think I'm being followed, I don't know by whom...

shovel.name: Dirty Shovel
shovel.content: A shovel that appears to be similar to those found on the construction site.

strong_pills.name: Strong Pills
strong_pills.content: Boxes of almost empty antidepressant pills

cake.name: Cake
cake.content: Cake with a delicious look YUMMY

knife.name: Knife
knife.content: A knife stained with dry blood.

builder_info.name: Builder's Information
builder_info.content: I DON'T KNOW ANYTHING... Just came to do my job

email.name: Email
email.content:
to: Ronald Ericson
from: David Hutcherson

You didn't fix my car properly! You'll pay for this!

dead_body.name: Dead Body
dead_body.content:
The deceased person is Mr. Ronald Ericson.
Age: 34
Profession: Mechanic

syringe.name: Syringe
syringe.content: A used syringe at the construction site
